mapper.select: select * from (select * from tbl_reply where board_no = #{board_no} order by 1 desc)
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply( BOARD_NO, EMP_NO, REPLY_CONTENT) values( #{board_no}, #{emp_no}, #{reply_content})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set reply_count = (select count(reply_no) from tbl_reply where tbl_board.board_no = tbl_reply.board_no)
